Body: I connected my mobile device to the IOT hub. I would like to display the connectivity (online/offline) status of the device on IOT hub service app installed on another device. How to achieve this? Is there any automatic trigger/event that fires when there is change in connectivity status? Also is there any API in service SDK to check the connectivity status of the device.

Yes, we publish device connection state on Event Grid, which can be used for trigger: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-how-to-order-connection-state-events

"
